ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Shield of Song
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats a great idea actually!  I ll give this a try :) Thanks :)
ygData.messageBody:
Thats a great idea actually! I'll give this a try :)
Thanks :)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 09, 2001 8:09 AM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Shield of Song
>
>
> No SoS is great (in situations). If you are in a group which
> lacks healing
> from some reason, put your mandolin in hand and sing SoS,
> Hymm, SoS as your
> weave. You will be amazed at how well you mitigate damage.
>
> I am also experimenting with using SoS in the pull group on
> raids. WIth the
> new heal rules, the most important part of raids (at least in
> my opinion) is
> keeping your clerics alive. Giving the tanks a few extra
> rounds to build up
> hate, could mean the difference... Clearly don't do this is
> you are feign
> pulling :)
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
> http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
